meanings.definition: A small, nocturnal, arboreal marsupial native to Australia and New Guinea.
meanings.sent1: The phalanger climbed the tree quietly at night.
meanings.sent2: I saw a phalanger sleeping in the branches of the eucalyptus tree.
meanings.sent3: The phalanger wore a tiny nightcap to bed.
meanings.sent4: The phalanger moved through the trees like a shadow.
meanings.sent5: The phalanger's big eyes helped it see in the dark.

meanings.definition: Any of various marsupials of the family Phalangeridae, including the cuscuses and brushtail possums.
meanings.sent1: The zoo had a new exhibit featuring the phalanger and its relatives.
meanings.sent2: The phalangeridae family includes a variety of interesting marsupials.
meanings.sent3: The phalanger threw a party for all its cuscus cousins.
meanings.sent4: The brushtail possums and phalangers played together in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The Phalangeridae family reunion was a lively event.
